SELECT p.id as id, p.name as name, p.descripion as descripion, p.url as url, p.pid as pid, p.perms as perms, p.type as type, p.icon as icon, p.order_num as order_num FROM t_sys_permission p WHERE 1=1
and p.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and p.url like concat('%',#{url},'%')

SELECT pr.sys_permission_id as id FROM t_sys_user u INNER JOIN t_sys_role_user ru ON u.id = ru.sys_user_id INNER JOIN t_sys_permission_role pr ON ru.sys_role_id = pr.sys_role_id WHERE u.id = #{userid}
